\begin{equation}\label{ro-sigm} 
S= -\frac{1}{4\pi\alpha'} \int d\tau d\sigma \left(
\partial_a U \partial^a U  + f^2 \partial_a X \partial^a X + g^2 \partial_a Y
\partial^a Y + \partial_a X^i \partial^a X_i \right).

 O(\tau, \sigma) = 
a\left( 2f \frac{d f}{d{\rm{u}}} \partial_a  X \partial^a X 
+ 2g \frac{dg} {d{\rm{u}}} \partial_a Y \partial^a Y \right).
